com.riverbed.jsconapi.rest

Class SconNodeAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riverbed.jsconapi.rest.SconNodeAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SconObjectAPI

    public class SconNodeAPI
extends java.lang.Object
implements SconObjectAPI
    This class provides all the primitives to manage a Node on SteelConnect. A node is either a Gateway, SH-SD, Access Point or a Switch It will make the appropriate REST API calls to a given SCM organization.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    rjourdan romain.jourdan@gmail.com

        public static SconObject convertFromJson(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObj)
        This method parses a JsonObject that contains SteelConnect Node details and will build a SconNode object accordingly
        Specified by:
        convertFromJson in interface SconObjectAPI
        Parameters:
        jsonObj - the JsonObject that contains SteelConnect Node details
        Returns:
        a SconNode object

      • buildSconJsonObject

        public static javax.json.JsonObject buildSconJsonObject(SconObject obj)
        This method creates a JSON object to make REST API calls based on the SconNode object's attributes.
        Specified by:
        buildSconJsonObject in interface SconObjectAPI
        Parameters:
        obj - a SconNode object
        Returns:
        a JsonOject built with SconNode Attributes or null if the object was from a different instance.

      • get

        public static SconObject get(java.lang.String realmUrl,
                             java.lang.String objId)
        Returns a SconNode object based on its ID
        Specified by:
        get in interface SconObjectAPI
        Parameters:
        realmUrl - The URL of SteelConnect Realm in the following format "https://xyz.riverbed.cc"
        objId - The Id of the site we are looking for
        Returns:
        a SConNode object that matches objId or null if not found

      • getAll

        public static java.util.List<SconObject> getAll(java.lang.String realmUrl,
                                                java.lang.String orgID)
        Lists all SconNode that it gets from the SteelConnect Organization
        Specified by:
        getAll in interface SconObjectAPI
        Parameters:
        realmUrl - The URL of SteelConnect Realm in the following format "https://xyz.riverbed.cc"
        orgID - The id of the SteelConnect organization to make the call to. orgId will be in the following format "org-abc-xyz"
        Returns:
        a list of SconNode objects

      • registerHW

        public static SconObject registerHW(java.lang.String realmUrl,
                                    java.lang.String orgID,
                                    SconObject obj)
        Register HW appliance on SteelConnect. A Valid Serial number is required to process the request. Registering a Virtual or shadow appliance is recommended.
        Parameters:
        realmUrl - The URL of SteelConnect Realm in the following format "https://xyz.riverbed.cc"
        orgID - The id of the SteelConnect organization to make the call to. orgId will be in the following format "org-abc-xyz"
        obj - The Node to register and that needs to get a Serial number
        Returns:
        SconObject The SconNode that has been registered

      • registerVM

        public static SconObject registerVM(java.lang.String realmUrl,
                                    java.lang.String orgID,
                                    SconObject obj)
        Register VM or Shadow appliance on SteelConnect.
        Parameters:
        realmUrl - The URL of SteelConnect Realm in the following format "https://xyz.riverbed.cc"
        orgID - The id of the SteelConnect organization to make the call to. orgId will be in the following format "org-abc-xyz"
        obj - The Node to register. For Shadow appliance, have the simulated attribute sset to TRUE.
        Returns:
        SconObject The SconNode that has been registered

        orgID - The id of the SteelConnect organization to make the call to. orgId will be in the following format "org-abc-xyz"
        obj - The SconNode to be updated on SteelConnect
        Returns:
        SconNode the object that was updated

      • createVMImage

        public static java.lang.Boolean createVMImage(java.lang.String realmUrl,
                                              SconObject obj,
                                              java.lang.String imageType)
        Prepare a virtual image of an appliance via the REST API. It could be created in different format: Hyper-V, VMware, Xen...
        Parameters:
        realmUrl - The URL of SteelConnect Realm in the following format "https://xyz.riverbed.cc"
        obj - The SconNode for which we want to create a VM image on SteelConnect
        Returns:
        Boolean True if the request is accepted, false if there was a problem

      • getVMImageStatus

        public static java.lang.String getVMImageStatus(java.lang.String realmUrl,
                                                SconObject obj)
        Check the status of image creation of a virtual appliance via the REST API. It could be created in different format: Hyper-V, VMware, Xen...
        Parameters:
        realmUrl - The URL of SteelConnect Realm in the following format "https://xyz.riverbed.cc"
        obj - The SconNode for which we want to check the creation of an VM image on SteelConnect
        Returns:
        Boolean True if the request is accepted, false if there was a problem
